meanings.definition: The act of applying tension to a structure after it has been constructed.
meanings.sent1: Posttensioning helps make buildings stronger after they are built.
meanings.sent2: Engineers used posttensioning to reinforce the bridge after it was completed.
meanings.sent3: The posttensioning of the tower made it stand tall and proud.
meanings.sent4: Posttensioning is like giving a hug to a building to keep it sturdy.
meanings.sent5: The posttensioning process ensures the structure can withstand heavy loads.

meanings.definition: The process of strengthening a structure by adding tension to it after it has been built.
meanings.sent1: Posttensioning is crucial for ensuring the stability of the building.
meanings.sent2: Contractors implemented posttensioning to enhance the durability of the structure.
meanings.sent3: The posttensioning of the roof made it feel like a superhero cape.
meanings.sent4: Posttensioning breathes new life into the structure, making it resilient.
meanings.sent5: The posttensioning technique is a game-changer in construction for added strength.
